name: Medi + Rush
description:
Description: 

A game made for the My First Game Jam Summer 2022.

 A difficult time attack game where you brew potions and heal citizens. Everyone has gotten sick and you have to cure them as fast as you can. Study recipes and create potions to heal everyone before you get infected!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move.

E to interact

Mouse Click to shoot potion gun in boss.

G to drop first item and F to drop the second item.
